applications.name: Portfolio
applications.subHeading: By Fabio Sereno
applications.description: Highly Experienced Full Stack Web Developer of 10+ years (6+ in the FinTech sector). Highly self-motivated, enthusiastic, professional and a team player. Possesses strong analytical and problem solving skills, code proficiency, and an ability to follow through with projects from initiation to completion with innovation and creativity.

applications.subHeading: A sorting mechanism, implementing IComparable and IComparer to sort complex types

applications.subHeading: A natural string sorting algorithm implemnting IComparer, taking a comma seperated string of alphanumerical values.

applications.name: AWS .NET Core Shopping Cart API
applications.subHeading: A basic shopping cart application, with data processing handled by a Serverless .Net Core RESTful API. React handles the UI.
applications.description: Exploring the abilities of AWS Lambda and serverless applications (SAM), using .Net Core along with an AWS RESTful Gateway API.
